greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = 1 if n > 1 and A156552(n) is a square or a twice a square, 0 otherwise.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..65537
Index entries for sequences related to binary expansion of n
Index entries for sequences computed from indices in prime factorization
program: A156552(n) = {my(f = factor(n), p2 = 1, res = 0); for(i = 1, #f~, p = 1 << (primepi(f[i, 1]) - 1); res += (p * p2 * (2^(f[i, 2]) - 1)); p2 <<= f[i, 2]); res}; \\ From A156552 by _David A. Corneth_
xref: Cf. A053866, A156552, A323243, A324822, A324824, A324825 (inverse Möbius transform).
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Mar 16 2019
